msContents.summary: This text is written by Sudarśanācārya. This is a commentary on the Āpastaṃbhagṛhyasūtra. It is known as Gṛhyatātparyadarśanavyākhyā or Sudarśanasaṃhitā. The manuscript cites sometimes the gṛhyasūtra but it is not highlighted or indented. P. K. Gode (Annals of the Bhandarkar Oriental Research InstituteVol. 37, No. 1/4 (1956), pp. 55-57 ) has written an article discussing the period of Sudarśanācārya. According to P.K. Gode period of Sudarśanācārya could be between AD. 1300- 1500. O n 98v three lines are craved in granth script in Sanskrit : ulūkaśānti jvaraśānti is written in left margin. (98v 1) Unidentified text. (98v 2)kuberaṃ te mukhaṃ raudraṃ nandino nandimāpahaṃ jvararājāya vidmahe raktanetrāta dhīmahi jvararājāya vidmahe tri??skāya dhīmahi tanno jvaraha (98v 3)raḥ pracodayāt ..

msItem.title: Gṛhyatātparyadarśanam
msItem.author: Ārya Sudarśana

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol. II 127 a-b.

msItem.rubric: (1v 1) śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye ௳ śrīveṃkaṭāryamahāgurave namaḥ ௳
msItem.incipit: yo varṇairijyate ni (1v2) tyaiḥ karmabhiścoditairnijaiḥ / tebhyo ' pavargado yaśca taṃ namāmyadvayaṃ harim ||1||
msItem.explicit: (98r 7) dau maraṇamantarikṣamunirajasvalāsutikāmaraṇe aśaucamaraṇaṃ tasmādvividhamaraṇe kuśra trayaṃ kuryāt prājāpatya kuśrasya caturaḥ pratyāmūlānāha ௳

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blanck folio, 98 numbered folio

supportDesc.foliation: Folio are numbered in the left margin. Tamil numerals are used for numeration.
supportDesc.condition: Folio 91 is half broken. Some folio worm eaten. Sometimes syllables are not readable due to the bore holes produced by insects .

handNote.desc: Many times consonant clusters are difficult to read. Overall readable hand writing.

additions.desc: 132 is written in pink pencil on both guard folio.

TEI.text:
yo varṇairijyate ni (1v2) tyaiḥ karmabhiścoditairnijaiḥ / tebhyo ' pavargado yaśca taṃ namāmyadvayaṃ harim ௳ āpastambamuniṃ vande mandadhīhitakāmyayā yo nuṣṭheyapadārtānāṃ kra (1v 3)makalpayat ௳ yatkṛtaṃ vedavadbhāṣyamādriyante vipaścitaḥ sa kapardī ciraṃ jīyādvedavedārthatattvavit ௳ sudarśanāryaḥ kurute gṛhya (1v 4) tātparyadarśanaṃ kevalaṃ vaidikaśraddhāprerito mandadhīrapi ௳ atha karmāṇyācārādyāni gṛhyante athaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ | tadartha pūrvavṛttamucyate | (1v 5)iha hi yajñā ekaviṃśatibhedāḥ | tatra ca sapta pākayajñasaṃsthāḥ- aupāsanahomo, vaiśvadevaṃ, pārvaṇa, maṣṭakā, māsiśrāddhaṃ, sarpabaliṃ, rīśānabaliriti| sapta ca haviryajñasaṃsthāḥ
(98r 1)durācāraṃ yaṃ vihitānanuṣṭhānaṃ yo vipro vihitaṃ nānutiṣṭhati niṣiddhaścācarati tasya gṛhe bhuktvā dinamekamupavaset . tadaśaktau prāyaścittāntaramāha . sadācārasya vi (98r 2)prasya tatā vedāntaveditaḥ . bhuktānnaṃ mucyate pāpād hotrāntaraṃ nara iti ….. (98r 7) dau maraṇamantarikṣamunirajasvalāsutikāmaraṇe aśaucamaraṇaṃ tasmādvividhamaraṇe kuśra trayaṃ kuryāt prājāpatya kuśrasya caturaḥ pratyāmūlānāha ||
